text: 4000 (four thousand) is the natural number following 3999 and preceding 4001. 4000 in scientific notation is 4*10^3. 4000 is also a Harshad number, because 4000/4+0+0+0 is 1000. ==Roman Numerals== 4000 in Roman Numerals is written as ÄªV. ==Factors of 4000== The factors of 4000 are 1, 2, 4, 5, 8, 10, 16, 20, 25, 32, 40, 50, 80, 100, 125, 160, 200, 250, 400, 500, 800, 1000, 2000 and 4000. ==Examples that equal to 4000== 1234 + 2766 = 4000 4321 - 321 = 4000 2000 * 2 = 4000 8000/2 = 4000 ==References== Category:Integers
title: 4000 (number)
